DOC.brief_summary: Patients will be followed up for max 18 months. Information on the Adverse Events and potential misuse or abuse of Xyrem ® will be collected.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Evaluate Risks of Side Effects, Drug Abuse and Dependence in Patients Who Received Xyrem ® on Prescription
DOC.criteria: Patients who received Xyrem ® on prescription No limitations
